description: Gets a session action for the job.

parameters.name: farmId
parameters.description: The farm ID for the session action.

parameters.name: queueId
parameters.description: The queue ID for the session action.

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The job ID for the session.

parameters.name: sessionActionId
parameters.description: The session action ID for the session.

nested_items.name: sessionActionId
nested_items.description: The session action ID.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the session action.

nested_items.name: startedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the resource started running.

nested_items.name: endedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the resource ended running.

nested_items.name: workerUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The Linux timestamp of the date and time the session action was last updated.

nested_items.name: progressPercent
nested_items.description: The percentage completed for a session action.

nested_items.name: sessionId
nested_items.description: The session ID for the session action.

nested_items.name: processExitCode
nested_items.description: The process exit code. The default Deadline Cloud worker agent converts unsigned 32-bit exit codes to signed 32-bit exit codes.

nested_items.name: progressMessage
nested_items.description: The message that communicates the progress of the session action.

nested_items.name: definition
nested_items.description: The session action definition.

nested_items.name: environmentId
nested_items.description: The environment ID.

nested_items.name: environmentId
nested_items.description: The environment ID.

nested_items.name: taskId
nested_items.description: The task ID.

nested_items.name: stepId
nested_items.description: The step ID.

nested_items.name: parameters
nested_items.description: The task parameters.

nested_items.name: int
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: int
nested_items.description: A signed integer represented as a string.

nested_items.name: float
nested_items.description: A double precision IEEE-754 floating point number represented as a string.

nested_items.name: string
nested_items.description: A UTF-8 string.

nested_items.name: path
nested_items.description: A file system path represented as a string.

nested_items.name: syncInputJobAttachments
nested_items.description: The job attachments to sync with a session action.

nested_items.name: stepId
nested_items.description: The step ID for the step in the job attachment.

nested_items.name: acquiredLimits
nested_items.description: The limits and their amounts acquired during a session action. If no limits were acquired during the session, this field isn't returned.

nested_items.name: limitId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the limit.

nested_items.name: count
nested_items.description: The number of limit resources used.
